ModMetaData:
FishEggs.ProgrammerLily.com
Universal Pond Stocking + Fish Egg Seeding
ProgrammerLily
Allow pawns to stock any water tile using right-clickable Fish Egg items that trigger a targeting cursor. Fish eggs are tied to specific fish and water types, and can be obtained through traders or by fishing. Seeding fish grants Animals XP and integrates with Vanilla Fishing Expanded.="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
